EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DBS CHECK REQUIRED Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Following our earlier email about your DBS check, please see below for the login information needed to use the online application (secret word updated):
1: The Online Application
Click here to go to our DBS provider, GB Group (https://gbg.onlinedisclosures.co.uk)
Click REGISTER
You need to provide an organisation PIN & secret word. These are:
- Organisation PIN: 140118 - Secret Word: Z4LQX
YOU MUST APPLY USING THE SAME EMAIL ADDRESS THAT THIS EMAIL WAS SENT TO otherwise we will not be able to match your DBS to your records.
2: The Documents
You will need to take some documents to be checked at a local Post Office
You will be told what documents you need when you apply Not all post offices can check the documents. - you can ask at your nearest Post Office whether they offer "DBS Verification Service" - or click here for a full list of Post Offices you can use
You can click here for a full guide on the DBS process.
It can take several weeks for a DBS to returned, so please make sure you complete the process as soon as possible.
All the best, NCS Graduates Team
The Challenge Society
The Challenge is a major provider of NCS (National Citizen Service)
